channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @andypiper @KevinCTofel Thanks -- I did fill in that form yesterday, but it wasn't clear that it would be understood, since there was no space to explain what the problem was.
item.source:markdown: @andypiper @KevinCTofel Thanks -- I did fill in that form yesterday, but it wasn't clear that it would be understood, since there was no space to explain what the problem was.

item.description: @dawnjurgensen @BeschlossDC @CarolLeonnig Inept is not the correct nomenclature. Corrupt.
item.source:markdown: @dawnjurgensen @BeschlossDC @CarolLeonnig Inept is not the correct nomenclature. Corrupt.

item.description: @jeremyzilar They won’t accept the link from anywhere. I am giving up for now and using a different domain name.
item.source:markdown: @jeremyzilar They won’t accept the link from anywhere. I am giving up for now and using a different domain name.

item.description:
How stupid does the Secret Service think we are?

We should try firing the entire Secret Service and see what they do.

Another “how dumb do they think we are” question.

The Secret Service must have known Trump was trying to overthrow the government.

Assuming they swore an oath to uphold the Constitution what’s their excuse for not stopping it?
item.source:markdown:
How stupid does the Secret Service think we are?
We should try firing the entire Secret Service and see what they do.
Another “how dumb do they think we are” question.
The Secret Service must have known Trump was trying to overthrow the government.
Assuming they swore an oath to uphold the Constitution what’s their excuse for not stopping it?
